SEARCH
Package CS506Team25.Card_Engine

Class CardEngineController

java.lang.Object
CS506Team25.Card_Engine.CardEngineController
@RestController @CrossOrigin public class CardEngineController extends Object
The "CardEngineController" class contains all methods to run the euchre card engine. It contains a test method (hello()), a method to login (login()), and a method to register (register()).

    CardEngineController()
    On start up make sure backend and database are synced

  • Method Details

    • hello

      @GetMapping("/") public String hello()
      Test method to test functionality of @GetMapping("/")
      Returns:
      "Hello World"

    • login

      @PostMapping("/login") public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode login(@RequestParam String username)
      Login method connecting to the database through @PostMapping("/login") Uses a prepared statement to find a user in the database (if they exist) and allow them to login
      Parameters:
      username - username of player attempting to log in
      Returns:
      JSON of player's id, username, and date joined. Returns null if not found for login failed { "user_id": Integer, "user_name": String, "date_joined": String }

    • register

      @PostMapping("/register") public String register(@RequestParam String username)
      Register method connecting to the database through @PostMapping("/register") Uses a prepared statement to find if a desired username is already in use If username is available, inserts username into database and registers user
      Parameters:
      username - Username attempting to be registered
      Returns:
      "User already exists" Desired username already in use "User successfully registered" Username registered and added to database

    • createGame

      @PostMapping("games/euchre/create-game") public String createGame(int playerID, String gameName, @RequestParam(required=false) String gamePassword)
      Creates a game that players can join
      Parameters:
      gameName - name that will be displayed in lobby
      gamePassword - optional argument, creates a password for the game
      Returns:
      Newly created game's ID

    • assignSeat

      @PostMapping("games/euchre/{gameID}/select-seat") public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode assignSeat(@PathVariable String gameID, int playerID, int seatNumber)
      Allows a player to select their seat, is functionally how a player joins a game
      Parameters:
      gameID - ID of game you're trying ot join
      playerID - your player ID
      seatNumber - which seat at the table you want to join 1-4
      Returns:
      of all of a games attributes, note that player1 is seat 1 and so on. GameID also included. Return null if couldn't join game.

    • getOpenGames

      @GetMapping("games/euchre/open-games") public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getOpenGames()
      Returns:
      A JSON of all games that can be joined with key game name and values game id and number of players, null if an error occurs { "{game-name}": JSON { "game_id": Integer, "number_players": Integer } }

    • getCurrentGames

      @GetMapping("games/euchre/current-games") public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getCurrentGames()
      Returns:
      A JSON of all games that are currently ongoing, null if an error occurs { "{game-name}": JSON { "game_id": Integer, "number_players": Integer } }

    • getGameInfo

      @GetMapping("/games/euchre/{gameID}") public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getGameInfo(@PathVariable String gameID)
      Get information about a game
      Parameters:
      gameID - game's id
      Returns:
      JSON of all of a games attributes, note that player1 is seat 1 and so on { "game_id": Integer, "game_name": String, "player1_id": Integer, "player2_id": Integer, "player3_id": Integer, "player4_id": Integer, "player1_name": String, "player2_name": String, "player3_name": String, "player4_name": String, "game_status": String, "winner_1": Integer, "winner_2": Integer, "creation_date": String }

    • getAllLobbies

      @GetMapping("/games/euchre/lobbies") public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getAllLobbies()

    • deleteGame

      @DeleteMapping("/games/euchre/{gameID}") public int deleteGame(@PathVariable String gameID)
      Get information about a game
      Parameters:
      gameID - game's id
      Returns:
      id of deleted game if game is successfully deleted. -1 if game could not be deleted

    • resetPlayersStats

      @DeleteMapping("player/{playerID}/stats") public Boolean resetPlayersStats(@PathVariable String playerID)
      Used to delete a player's stored statistics in all games
      Parameters:
      playerID - the id of the player who wishes to reset their statistics
      Returns:
      true if player stats successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • getPlayerStats

      @GetMapping("player/{playerID}/stats") public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getPlayerStats(@PathVariable String playerID)
      Retrieves the statistics for a player identified by the provided playerID. The returned JSON contains information about the games in which the player participated. {gameID}: - "player1": The username of player 1 in the game. - "player2": The username of player 2 in the game. - "player3": The username of player 3 in the game. - "player4": The username of player 4 in the game. - "date": The date of the game. - "winner1": The username of the first winner in the game, or "bot" if it's a bot player. - "winner2": The username of the second winner in the game, or "bot" if it's a bot player.
      Parameters:
      playerID - The ID of the player for whom statistics are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An ObjectNode containing the player's statistics in JSON format. null otherwise.

    • changeUsername

      @PutMapping("/player/{playerID}") public String changeUsername(@PathVariable String playerID, String newUserName)
      Changing username given the userid
      Parameters:
      playerID - id of user
      newUserName - new username
      Returns:
      string successful or failed.

    • getPlayerInfo

      @GetMapping("/player/{playerID}") public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getPlayerInfo(@PathVariable String playerID)
      Get information about a player
      Parameters:
      playerID - player's id
      Returns:
      JSON of player's id, username, and date joined { "user_id": Integer, "user_name": String, "date_joined": String }

      Parameters:
      playerID - player's id
      Returns:
      id of deleted player, -1 if failed

      @GetMapping("/player") public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getAllUsers()

      A JSON of current users { "{user-name}": JSON { "user_id": Integer, "date_joined": String } }
